mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tblBoard ORDER BY boardGroup DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tblBoard (boardIdx, memID, title, content, writer, boardGroup, boardSequence, boardLevel, boardAvailable) SELECT COALESCE(MAX(boardIdx)+1, 1), #{memID}, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, COALESCE(MAX(boardGroup)+1, 0), 0, 0, 1 FROM tblBoard

SELECT COALESCE(MAX(boardIdx)+1, 1) AS boardIdx, COALESCE(MAX(boardGroup)+1, 0) AS boardGroup FROM tblBoard
INSERT INTO tblBoard (boardIdx, memID, title, content, writer, boardGroup, boardSequence, boardLevel, boardAvailable) VALUES (#{boardIdx}, #{memID}, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{boardGroup}, 0, 0, 1)
